attributes.action: Re: Sanofi Worldwide shortage of vital BCG Bladder CANCER vaccine.
attributes.additional_details:
There will be none of this potentially life saving vaccine available before the end of 2013. French Pharmaceutical group Sanofi has recalled vaccines and is now undergoing refurbishment of their production plant.
We think it time the government issued UK licenses for the BCG vaccine which is in production in other countries, making it available to the 1000's of cancer sufferers in the UK population, and not having to rely on one French production plant .
